meta.description: 12-week Mounjaro treatment journey for E2E testing

weekSummary.notes: End of 2.5mg phase. Total lost: 4kg in 4 weeks
Dose escalation week - typical side effects, good weight loss
End of 5.0mg phase. Total lost: 8.8kg in 8 weeks
Dose escalation week - side effects resolving by day 4
Holiday week - maintained well despite festivities. Small uptick after Christmas, quickly recovered.

weeklyProcess: 1. Login to app (or remain logged in)
2. For each day in the week:
a. If injection day: Navigate to /jabs/new and enter injection data
b. If weight day (weight !== null): Navigate to /weight/new and enter weight
c. Navigate to /log and enter daily log data
3. After completing the week, navigate to /summary and /results
5. STOP and wait for user review
pausePoints: After any error or unexpected behavior
When hitting a page that doesn't load properly
